channel.title: School based site :)
channel.description:
I have been messing around with servers alot for the past two years i've had tons of fun but, its time for me to leave Runescape behind. This past week i applied to get into AAST (Academy for academics,art,science and technology) for digital arts and communication and this summer i will have to create a project that will be due the first day of school so my project is born....
I will be making a site/forum that will be for kids in school who are looking for help with homework, assignments, sell things electronics etc to other members in school and such!
Some from today Until August 25th i will be taking on a task of making a forum in php!
So stay tuned here i will be updating every 2 days to keep everyone informed.
